attributes.title: Trump dump
attributes.review: I wanted to help my president and and then this expired orange showed up on the screen dose that usually happen I hate this app it it wasn’t working and it said vote for a clown I’m not voting for a clown or expired orange SO NOBODY CAN SEE THIS TRAAAAAAAAASH !!!because nobody wants to see vote for trump get rid of it lord the sentence vote for trump its a disease even corona is afraid of it my phone even brakes looking at vote for trump sorry..... NOT SORRY👍👍🙄👎👎😁

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app is so bad, where do I begin. First of all it’s about the racist, homophobic, Cheeto in the White House. Also, it contains a demonic phase, “Trump 2020”. I might not make it to heaven just for typing that. 45 is the devil and to say something that encourages his re-election is totally disgusting. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! By downloading it you are supporting 45. In conclusion, Trump is racist and homophobic, and if you support him you disgust me.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I believe the app is selling information because after getting it and putting in my phone number I have been getting calls all day and all night it’s terrible. The president based on saying he protects Americans is really just selling away our information probably to Russia.

attributes.title: Confusing
attributes.review: The whole set up of this app is very confusing. The slogan also says “keep America great” in this sense I would like to know how has America become great over the past 3 years? There are kids in cages and black people are being murdered. So that’s what we’re KEEPING? Also the it’s very confusing to just use.

attributes.title: Hispanic life matter
attributes.review: Let start it took to many time to download the app is glitch that it restart my phone and now it took of all my stuff when I go in it it also was so hard to get in it took 8 hours for me to get in sorry but one star all the way how can u allow this app to be here 🙁

attributes.title: DISGUSTING DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: So when I download this app the first thing that happened is that it was glitching out of control, and I kept seeing this orange man on my screen. I was MORTIFIED to say the least. Then I was going to a certain part of the app where it said some disgusting words, that here sexist, homophobic, and racist!! I’m tired of president trump I was looking foward to getting your app😔

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: I really wanted to understand why I should vote for him in the upcoming election, but this app was horrible. It provided no useful information and was just overall poorly made. It 0 stars was an option that’s exactly what I’d give it’s. I say you just save the space on your phone and don’t download this app.

attributes.title: Do not download 😿
attributes.review:

attributes.title: Deadly.
attributes.review: Now normally I love apps and downloading is fairly quick HOWEVER this app took 18 hours to download. When I went on to the app I noticed nude pictures of our orange god. I would’ve have been fine on a normal day but I had a paper cut and as I waited watching the time run out for the download I died from blood loss. Fix this💕♥️🦋

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: When I opened the app the screen keep flash to a white screen with the words you are stupid umm..... as some one who know how smart that are quickly closed out and came to write a review, but what about the gullible little guy. What if they start to believe it, fall into a state of depression and jump off a bridge. 1 STAR!!!!!✨💖🦋🌺🧚🏿
